p.strong: Food order changes allowed on April 20 & 21, 2020. Changes go into effect on 4-27-2020. Read More in letter.

div.a: Applications for Student Board Member & Superintendent Advisory Due May 4th

span.p: Applications for a new Student Board Member & Superintendent Advisory Due May 4th by Noon. Be a leader and represent the students body at board meetings and at Superintendent Advisory Meetings. how will you serve the community? You are eligible, if you will be a senior for 2020 - 2021. Thls is a resume builder and there is a $500 scholarship for the student school board member. Students need to file an application and will interview with the school board. EMAIL Completed Applications to cschmidt@crestviewlocal.k12.oh.us
Please enjoy the following videos of Crestview High School's Class of 2020. Just click on the link!

Easter greetings to our elementary peeps!

span.span: Happy Easter to our elementary peeps!

a.title: Click to read more about: Easter greetings to our elementary peeps!

div.a: Read More about Easter greetings to our elementary peeps!

meta.b: We want to thank everyone who bought/ sold tumblers for our Spring 2020 fundraiser! And a special thank you to the Crestview PTO for their large tumbler purchase for students! The tumblers were ordered before businesses were shut down, so you will be receiving all orders placed. The tumblers that were directly shipped should have already been received. The tumblers that were scheduled to be delivered by students will be picked up at the school as soon as it is declared safe to do so by Governor Dewine. Students who sold tumblers will still receive prizes as a thank you for selling! Below is the list of students who earned prizes and how those prizes will look with our current situation.

a.title: Click to read more about: Tumbler Fundraiser Prize Winners

div.a: Read More about Tumbler Fundraiser Prize Winners

span.p: Below is a draft proposal for in person graduation dates. We are going to do everything humanly possible to give you some key events in person as long as circumstances allow! This is only a draft and we are working with staff and our students representatives. Hang in there and We Miss You! We will be acknowledging our seniors, when the stay at home order lifts. In the meantime, we would like to thank Mrs. Nappinfor a wonderful Senior Tribute she put together at the webpage. Here are some alternate plans at the link! We have no way to predict when we get together, but when we do, it will be one great celebration. Hang in the there and be safe and healthy!

div.a: Crestview Board of Education is Soliciting Bids for OT/PT/Speech & Nursing Services

span.p:
Crestview Local Schools
Proposal Notice
The Board of Education, Crestview Local School District will be accepting proposals for purchased services for occupational/physical therapy, speech and nursing services as required by the Federal Procurement Policy. We will be soliciting proposals until 12:00 PM Friday, May 1, 2020, for the 2020-2021 school year.
Please contact the Crestview Local School District Office of the School Treasurer at 44100 Crestview Road, Suite A, Columbiana, OH 44408 or by calling 330-482-5526 or emailing cmercure@crestviewlocal.k12.oh.us to request a bid proposal. Bid Proposals are available upon request and will be e-mailed to you or you may pick them up at the Office of the School Treasurer.
The bids submitted shall not impose any liability on the Crestview Local Board of Education, and the right to accept or reject any or all bids or parts thereof, is solely at the discretion of the said Board.

Charlene Mercure, Treasurer
Crestview Local School District

a.title: Boys Varsity Track vs. Campbell & Liberty

div.a: Boys Varsity Track vs. Campbell & Liberty

div.p: The Crestview Local Schools do not exclude any persons from participating in classes or programs on the ground of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or handicap. The Crestview Local School hearing officer for compliance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act; Title IX of the Education Amendment of 1972; and section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, is Matthew T Manley Superintendent. To file a complaint phone (330) 482-5526 or write to 44100 Crestview Road, Suite A, Columbiana, Ohio 44408. Crestview Local School District is an equal opportunity employer.
